three semantic aspects.from sentence: In this paper we explore three semantic aspects of story understanding : ( i ) the sequence of events described in the story , ( ii ) the evolution of sentiment and emotional trajectories , and ( iii ) topical consistency .

first aspect.from sentence: The first aspect is motivated from approaches in semantic script induction , and evaluates if events described in an ending - alternative are likely to occur within the sequence of events described in the preceding context .

sentiment.from sentence: Our model captures this by evaluating if the sentiment described in an ending option makes sense considering the context of the story .

topic.from sentence: Our model accounts for that by analyzing if the topic of an ending option is consistent with the preceding context .

log - linear model.from sentence: We present a log - linear model that is used to weigh the various aspects of the story using a hidden variable .
